sub-events.comment: Toggle between keyboard and gamepad mode

Disable - Disables the ability to resize the window in principle Original - The window at startup will have the original size, which is specified in the settings 2x - The original window size will be increased by 2 times 3x - The original window size will be increased by 3 times 4x - The original window size will be increased by 4 times FullScreen - The game will be opened in full screen mode
P.S these settings will be ignored on mobile platforms

action.name: Call function
action.param: "perhaps graphic glitches, to remove them you need to walk"

action.name: Call function
action.param: "A mistake was made in the command, it is impossible to execute!"

sub-events.comment: hiding or showing the icon depending on the platform

action.name: Set datalist words
action.param: "Alert,Exit (Game or Console),Fly,Ghost,MovePlayerX (Value),MovePlayerY (Value),Suicide ,Call function (Function),Restart (Level or game),,GameInfo,Play (Audio name),Timescale (Value),Set PauseStyle (Original/SSW),Set ScreenSize (Disable/Original/2x/3x/4x/FullScreen),Set Character (1/2/3),Set Lives (Value),Set Rings (Value),Set HUDStyle(Linum/Sonic3/SSW) ,LayoutName,GoToLayout (Name),Set Cursor(1-4)"

sub-events.comment: Copies parameters from the original transition

event-group.description: Disables or enables events depending on the needs of the game
